text: Xuanwei () is a county-level city in the northeast of Yunnan Province, China, bordering Guizhou province to the east. It is under the administration of the prefecture-level city of Qujing. ==Food== It is famous as the origin of Xuanwei ham. ==Climate== ==External links== *Xuanwei City official website Category:County-level divisions of Qujing Category:Cities in Yunnan
title: Xuanwei
